ARABIC: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِأَعْدَآئِكُمْ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّا وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ نَصِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah knows best who your enemies are. Allah suffices as a Protector; Allah suffices as a Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But God knows your enemies well: and sufficient is God to protect you, and sufficient is God for all help.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah knows your enemies better and Allah suffices as a protector and Allah suffices as a helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God knows who are your enemies. You need to have no guardian or helper other than God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah well knows your enemies; Allah is Sufficient as a Guardian, and Allah is Sufficient as a Supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah has full knowledge of your enemies, and Allah is sufficient as a Wali (Protector), and Allah is sufficient as a Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah best knows your enemies; and Allah suffices as a Guardian, and Allah suffices as a Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God knows well your enemies; God suffices as a protector, God suffices as a helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah knoweth best (who are) your enemies. Allah is sufficient as a Guardian, and Allah is sufficient as a Supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God is quite aware as to who your enemies are; God suffices as a patron, and God suffices as a supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah is Knower of your enemies. Sufficieth Allah as a Friend and sufficieth Allah as a Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But Allah knows your enemies better, and Allah suffices as guardian, and Allah suffices as helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But Allah hath full knowledge of your enemies: Allah is enough for a protector, and Allah is enough for a Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah has full knowledge of your enemies, and Allah is Sufficient as a Wali (Protector), and Allah is Sufficient as a Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But Allah knows best your enemies. It is sufficient that Allah is the Guardian, and it is sufficient that Allah is the Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But God knows your enemies best. God is sufficient as a Protector, and God is sufficient as a Supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah is most knowing of your enemies; and sufficient is Allah as an ally, and sufficient is Allah as a helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:45] God has better knowledge of your enemies, than you do, and He informs you of them in order that you avoid them. God suffices as a Protector, a Preserver of you from them, God suffices as a Helper, defending you against their plotting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah knoweth best (who are) your enemies) from among the hypocrites and the Jews. (Allah is sufficient as a Friend) as a Protector, (and Allah is sufficient as a Helper) as a Defender against them.
